concept.title: 5301.670 Appointment of Property Administrators and Plant Clearance Officers

conbody.p: (a) When the Air Force retains contract administration, the PCO must select, appoint, or terminate (in writing) property administrators and plant clearance officers. One level above the PCO shall approve any of these appointments.
